name: Curve ibBTC Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) and ibBTC, a yield-bearing synthetic bitcoin from Badger Finance.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) and ibBTC, a yield-bearing synthetic bitcoin from Badger Finance.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) and ibBTC, a yield-bearing synthetic bitcoin from Badger Finance.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC y renBTC) e ibBTC, un bitcoin sintético con rendimiento de Badger Finance.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) and ibBTC, a yield-bearing synthetic bitcoin from Badger Finance.

This metapool contains sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) and ibBTC, a yield-bearing synthetic bitcoin from Badger Finance.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu meta havuz, sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC ve renBTC) ve Badger Finance'ten getiri sağlayan sentetik bir bitcoin olan ibBTC'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) and ibBTC, a yield-bearing synthetic bitcoin from Badger Finance.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含元池 sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) 和由 Badger 发行的自生息比特币 ibBTC。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस मेटापूल में sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, और renBTC) और ibBTC शामिल हैं, जो Badger Finance का एक उपज-असर सिंथेटिक बिटकॉइन है।
